data.text:
To achieve the #GlobalGoals & leave no one behind, access to accurate information is essential.

More from @UNESCO on Tuesday's #AccessToInfoDay: https://t.co/9vJTQhwrMJ https://t.co/RY2Mw0itep

🔸 Educate
🔸 Vaccinate
🔸 Eliminate

@WHO explains how to prevent and #EndRabies on Tuesday's World Rabies Day: https://t.co/KtqaNFd1kk

Yemen: 3,500+ children were victims of grave violations as hostilities intensified in 2019 & 2020. 

New @childreninwar report warns of endless suffering and a massive humanitarian crisis after 7 years of armed conflict. 
https://t.co/e0xOsnuMay

Access to information is a basic human right, which improves transparent governance, helps protect our health, reduces inequalities & much more.

@UNESCO has more on Tuesday's #AccessToInfoDay: https://t.co/9vJTQheQo9 https://t.co/mbIXpYb1Xy

Speaking now at #UNGA:

Congo; Dominica; Morocco; Mozambique; Trinidad and Tobago; Tunisia; Nepal; Nicaragua; Canada; Democratic People's Republic of Korea; Guinea; and Timor Leste.

https://t.co/WdhsaJh45S

Day 6 of the #UNGA General Debate continues - watch it LIVE. 

https://t.co/WdhsaJh45S

https://t.co/3x8natgT6w

🌳 Forest protection in Ghana
🏍️ Electric motorcycles in Kenya
🌅 Solar-powered water systems in Somalia

During this #AfricaClimateWeek, see how people across the continent are taking #ClimateAction: 
https://t.co/icZCD2NOo0

Speaking soon at the #UNGA General Debate:

San Marino; Oman; Sao Tome and Principe; Côte d'Ivoire; Brunei Darussalam; Mauritania; Niger; France; and Cameroon.

https://t.co/WdhsaJh45S

UN Peacekeeping missions are helping to achieve the #GlobalGoals by:

➡️reducing inequalities
➡️supporting gender equality
➡️protecting communities
➡️strengthening peace, justice & institutions 
& more...

Learn about the work of @UNPeacekeeping https://t.co/1AkYG74EeJ https://t.co/PoYrBpacPg

Speaking this morning at #UNGA:

Israel: @naftalibennett; Belarus; Yemen; United Arab Emirates; Syria; Iceland; Algeria; Grenada; Eritrea; and Bahrain.

https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek

Watch LIVE as day 6 of the #UNGA General Debate gets underway.

https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek

https://t.co/3x8nasZieY

Tourism generates opportunities for all.

After being profoundly impacted by #COVID19, this key sector has the potential to advance prosperity & drive inclusive, sustainable development. https://t.co/0bqeAEuFLa #WorldTourismDay https://t.co/FF53XG1pGO

Misinformation is dangerous and is hampering our ability to make progress on global issues and prolonging the pandemic.

We can all take action now. 

#PledgeToPause & take time to verify facts before sharing something online. https://t.co/qFqoh7loX2 https://t.co/jLRhqKde3S

"With many millions of livelihoods in jeopardy, it is time to rethink, transform, and safely restart tourism."

-- @antonioguterres on Monday's #WorldTourismDay. https://t.co/Qoor6CV42i https://t.co/pbCSLHoX3q

"We are sometimes called the lost #COVID19 generation - but we’re not the lost generation, we are the WELCOME generation. So let's join hands together so that we can work towards a better tomorrow together." 

-- @BTS_twt share their message of hope with @MelissaFleming. https://t.co/3nem1IF1d9

Only when vaccines reach everyone will we be safe.

Watch as @UNDP Goodwill Ambassadors @conniebritton, @PadmaLakshmi, @yemialadee & Michelle Yeoh discuss the need to share #COVID19 vaccines fairly around the 🌍 to end the pandemic. https://t.co/o2dOSCs5Qg #VaccinEquity https://t.co/ZqiBJTjpVN

Global leaders, activists, advocates & people from around the world have joined the UN family in pledging to keep the promise of the #GlobalGoals.

See some examples & get inspired to make your own promise for a better tomorrow! https://t.co/q0amLJXPBH

"Education means everything to me."

"All of my dreams are ruined."

Girls from Afghanistan joined @AminaJMohammed, @Malala & others to discus what is at stake for female students & offer solutions to keep girls' education alive in the country. https://t.co/t58lf1dTBM #UNGA https://t.co/vbrjqYSvio

The #GlobalGoals are the world's to-do list for a better & more sustainable future for all.

From taking #ClimateAction and promoting gender equality to speaking out against injustices, we all have a role to play in transforming our world. https://t.co/Ss4uMcXdcV https://t.co/Ugte6Xn095

Access to contraception is a fundamental right. 

It contributes to improved health outcomes and benefits individuals, families and communities.

Key facts from @WHO on Sunday's #WorldContraceptionDay: https://t.co/9PxDTDmGL4 https://t.co/lpxVFC7AXG

During this week's UN @FoodSystems Summit, @UNEP & @YaleArch have installed a living green wall of edible plants at UNHQ. 

The exhibit showcases how architecture can contribute to fresher food supply, cleaner air, reduced energy consumption & more. 
https://t.co/HjV9BQfFtX #UNGA https://t.co/acEQkoADnX

"Power is usually not given. Power is taken."

-- @antonioguterres stresses the need for a more balanced distribution of power between men & women. https://t.co/FwCqpG7Cs3 https://t.co/wlfHiZrego

Every woman and girl in every part of the world should have access to the contraceptive method of her choice.

On Sunday's #WorldContraceptionDay and every day, @UNFPA works to ensure access to safe, voluntary family planning. https://t.co/D3kg15U639

To achieve a peaceful & sustainable future, the world must be free of nuclear weapons. 

More on Sunday's International Day for the Total Elimination of Nuclear Weapons. https://t.co/GhGYboM3DH  #GlobalGoals https://t.co/HDTqHNe6EC

"Let's join hands together so that we can work towards a better tomorrow together." 

-- @BTS_twt shared their message of hope for a better future this week at #UNGA. 

Join them in supporting the #GlobalGoals! https://t.co/hKdCXOxAbs https://t.co/gMtLsImPXL

It's the biggest diplomatic week of the year!

Take a look back as world leaders, influencers, advocates & more gathered at UNHQ in New York for the #UNGA high-level week to find solutions to some of the world's biggest challenges. https://t.co/otrSlMhkRL https://t.co/pVTLwNv3vD

.@AminaJMohammed to speak at #GlobalCitizen Festival in Central Park, NYC to talk about the #GlobalGoals on the world stage.

https://t.co/RWS6aKMBQe

Now is the time to eliminate nuclear weapons from our world, and usher in a new era of dialogue, trust and peace for all people.

-- @antonioguterres on Sunday's International Day for the Total Elimination of Nuclear Weapons. https://t.co/qQ95JM4J44 https://t.co/lCuf2j2Clm

Speaking now at #UNGA:

Samoa; Tuvalu: @TuvaluPM; Antigua and Barbuda; Solomon Islands; Mali: @GouvMali; Holy See; Ethiopia; Liechtenstein; and Singapore.

The #UNGA General Debate continues - watch it LIVE. 

https://t.co/WdhsaIZtek

"A majority of the wealthier world is vaccinated while 90% of Africans are still waiting for their first dose.

This is an obscenity."

-- @antonioguterres stressed the need for #COVID19 vaccine equity during #UNGA general debate. https://t.co/VYgBz2HMN9 https://t.co/VWkKwbmsCH

Ending discrimination benefits everyone.

To prevent and #FightRacism is to create a better world, for all of us.

Get tips on how YOU can take action: https://t.co/PWxqEMAxTC https://t.co/V1xzpE1Rok

Happy birthday to our Messenger of Peace, Michael Douglas!

Thank you for your commitment to the work of the United Nations, especially on disarmament issues. https://t.co/fLmqGRd34n https://t.co/8HfrMRX82o

"The threats are clear and present. But it is not too late to act to ensure that #ClimateAction contributes to international peace and security."

-- @antonioguterres told the Security Council this week. https://t.co/jqILasG0r6 #UNGA https://t.co/T0rl2vygVc

100,000+ people around the world have come together to pledge their support for delivering on the promise of the #GlobalGoals. 

Make your promise & share your photo to inspire others to help create a better future for all! https://t.co/jtD3sXvpK7 https://t.co/zB19EIRLLK

"Education is front and centre -- especially for girls and for women."

-- @AminaJMohammed & others stress the need to ensure all young people in Afghanistan are able to exercise their right to education. #UNGA https://t.co/t58lf0WiKe

US$400+ billion in new commitments announced at #HLDE2021 to increase renewables & access to electricity & clean cooking technologies, but far more is needed to achieve affordable & clean energy for all. #UNGA
https://t.co/cVeU8FwtS0

Georgia: @GharibashviliGe; Australia: @ScottMorrisonMP; Kuwait; Serbia: @SerbianPM; Denmark: @Statsmin; Jamaica: @AndrewHolnessJM; Belize: @JohnBricenoBZE; Belgium: @alexanderdecroo; and Saint Kitts and Nevis: @pmharriskn.

🧔‍♂️ From habitat loss & poaching to the climate crisis, human activities are threatening the existence of big cats. 🐯 

Wildlife artist Sonny Behan & @UNEP colleagues discuss international efforts to protect wildlife in an #SDGLive conversation: https://t.co/OxKtFnBpUC #UNGA https://t.co/K8j61BDRYv

Greece: @kmitsotakis; Japan: @JPN_PMO; Malta: @RobertAbela_MT; Ireland: @MichealMartinTD; Albania: @ediramaal; New Zealand: @jacindaardern; Papua New Guinea; Luxembourg: @Xavier_Bettel; and Pakistan: @ImranKhanPTI.

-- @antonioguterres calls on all governments to cooperate on a just, inclusive & sustainable energy transition. https://t.co/cVeU8FO5gA #HLDE2021 https://t.co/SuZmPPCcpI

New @UNStamps featuring John Lennon celebrate the 50th anniversary of the recording of his iconic song 'Imagine' and his inspiring message of peace.

Get your stamps at https://t.co/m51MYJm55G https://t.co/CuuslWHSVC

Increased energy access will help reduce poverty, enable access to education & healthcare, improve gender equality and more.

Friday's High-Level Dialogue on Energy is historic opportunity to accelerate action on clean, affordable energy for all. https://t.co/flf0gC8gev #HLDE2021 https://t.co/WoTsjjf9lr

🎧 Take a listen as UN Messenger of Peace Jane Goodall (@JaneGoodallInst) and water activist & @UNEP #YoungChamps winner Xiayuon Ren talk about the need to improve water quality amid increasing impacts of the climate crisis. #ClimateAction 
https://t.co/9Eee7wpX7p https://t.co/UytQiexWex

UNHQ glows with images of marine species in an artistic call for #ClimateAction, solidarity & harmony with nature.

SUPERFLEX & @ART2030org discuss the "Interspecies Assembly" art project & its message to world leaders at #UNGA in #SDGLive conversation: https://t.co/OxKtFnBpUC https://t.co/bdSSPHabsA

From #COVID19 to the climate crisis to hunger, world leaders at #UNGA on Thursday emphasized the need for a robust, coordinated response to some of the biggest challenges facing humanity. https://t.co/cssOppZpXZ https://t.co/clAwfn5Phy

100,000+ people from around the world - including influencers, world leaders & many others - are doing their part in Keeping the Promise of the #GlobalGoals.

At Thursday's UN @FoodSystems Summit, @WFP & others stressed the need to transform the future of food. https://t.co/0TlqaC2iIp https://t.co/kLGwlfGEyl

"We are all part of the solution.
Let us all work together to mitigate & adapt to climate disruption to build peaceful & resilient societies."

-- @antonioguterres calls for more urgent #ClimateAction at the Security Council. https://t.co/VvWNofeugP #UNGA https://t.co/PkQL1JD5oa

Learn more about our efforts, including why vaccine equity will be needed to bring the pandemic to an end. https://t.co/hKi5ocZ8BM https://t.co/DQnvAEfvFA

What are YOU doing to make the world a better place?

People around the world are coming together to help achieve the #GlobalGoals & create a better future for everyone, everywhere.

"With 5 weeks until #COP26, we need to use every single day to get countries to be more ambitious & deliver action."

-- UN #ClimateAction Adviser @SelwinHart joins @IPCC_CH's Ko Barrett, @YAGClimate's @NisreenElsaim & @FemiOke for #SDGLive conversation: https://t.co/OxKtFnBpUC https://t.co/hXCHbR7Kiw

Thanks to the power of social media, YOU can join world leaders, influencers, advocates & more during #UNGA!

Thursday's International Day of Sign Languages highlights the importance of sign language for the human rights of deaf people. 

Find out more: https://t.co/GnYPsqxYtM https://t.co/GBAKPBDbI4

"I hope we can fill each of our days to the brim with positive energy. We thought the world had stopped, but it continues to move forward."

-- @BTS_twt shared their message of hope for a better future for all. Join them in supporting the #GlobalGoals: https://t.co/hKdCXOxAbs https://t.co/Cr8dRa2bCV

World leaders focused on the need for international solidarity in the face of the #COVID19 crisis, as well as pressing challenges to peace and security during the #UNGA general debate on Wednesday. https://t.co/cssOpqh0Px https://t.co/fPSayMW17f

"Yemenis need more than our words or our good intentions. They need our action. Without it, they will not weather this crisis or be able to build a better future." 

-- @UNReliefChief at #UNGA event on the world's largest humanitarian crisis in Yemen. 
https://t.co/C0ZGtBpEXB

🔸 70+ million people around the world are deaf.
🔸 80% of them live in developing countries.
🔸 Collectively, they use 300+ different sign languages.

Thursday is International Day of Sign Languages: https://t.co/GnYPsqxYtM https://t.co/3mIaOzwNpU

"Today's mobilisation of activism brings further promise that racial justice can be achieved."

At #UNGA, @UNHumanRights chief @mbachelet & world leaders stress urgent need to #FightRacism. https://t.co/7cn9vQV7hJ https://t.co/rVQDvE7c6F

There is enough food in the world to feed all 7 billion of us, yet, 811 million people go to bed hungry every night. 

At the same time, 1/3 of all food produced is lost or wasted. 🍎🥑 🗑

If we #StopTheWaste, we can help end hunger, for good. https://t.co/8f4a2OlSpy via @WFP https://t.co/5PTe4H3c5S

Speaking now at #UNGA: 
Venezuela: @NicolasMaduro; Mongolia: @UKhurelsukh; Kenya; Honduras: @JuanOrlandoH; Indonesia: @jokowi; Ukraine: @ZelenskyyUa; Malawi: @LazarusChakwera; and Cabo Verde: @PresidenciaCV.

The climate crisis is a threat to sustainable development. 
 
🌬️CO2 concentration,
🌡️temperatures,
🌊ocean acidification & heat,
🏝️sea-level rise, all have inter-connected impacts on the #GlobalGoals. 

More in new @WMO report: https://t.co/CeaYt5snEb https://t.co/oAck9I1jyD

"At a time when we feel more divided than ever, let us unite around our common humanity."

-- @antonioguterres says we must seize upon the momentum of the movement for racial justice & equality that has emerged with unprecedented force, reach & impact.

9 out of 10 people around the world breathe highly polluted air. 

Wednesday's #WorldCarFreeDay is an opportunity to take #ClimateAction & show how cites can look and feel without cars.

https://t.co/t3nJM2MAX6

🦏 Wednesday is #WorldRhinoDay. 🦏
 
Rhinoceros are among the world’s most endangered animals, threatened by both habitat loss and poaching. 

@UNEP has more on these iconic animals.⤵️
https://t.co/unwRqd1Fvq

Ending discrimination benefits everyone.

To prevent and #FightRacism is to create a better world, for all of us.

Get tips on how YOU can take action: https://t.co/PWxqEMS8La https://t.co/px7dpPHPKZ

Your everyday choices can help protect the planet and all its people. 

On Wednesday's #WorldCarFreeDay & every day, bike 🚴, walk 🚶‍♀️ or take public transport 🚋 whenever possible. https://t.co/TrmoKhFYEo #ActNow https://t.co/T1GnyAnCIy

The climate alarm bells are ringing at fever pitch.

Scorching temperatures. Shocking biodiversity loss. Polluted air, water & natural spaces. 

My message to every country: Don’t wait for others to make the first move. Do your part.

-- @antonioguterres at #UNGA. https://t.co/mTmhuUYTXt

I am encouraged by the important announcements made today at #UNGA by the leaders of the world’s two largest economies.

-- @antonioguterres as China & USA increase #ClimateAction commitments. https://t.co/YYDHRRjTKJ
